import React from 'react'; import { Modal, useMantineTheme } from '@mantine/core'; import './ProfileModal.css' function ProfileModal({show,setShow,data}) { const theme = useMantineTheme(); const {password,...others} =data; const [formData,setFormData]=useState(others); const[profileImage, setProfileImage]=useSatae(null); const [coverImage,setcoverImage] =usestate(null) return ( setShow(false)} >

); } export default ProfileModal;
